des: "Simple pepper parmesan salad dressing or dipping sauce for veggies! Hint:You can adjust the amount of pepper and garlic to suit your taste."
ins: Place sour cream, buttermilk, Parmesan, garlic, vinegar, pepper and salt into a blender or food processor and blend until well combined.  Transfer to a container with a tight-fitting lid and refrigerate for at least one hour for best flavor.  Note: Adjust amounts of salt and pepper to taste.  If a thinner consistency is desired, add more buttermilk.  To thicken, add equal parts of sour cream and parmesan.
